<style>.page-header-container {
        position: relative; /* Make the container a reference point for absolutely positioned elements */
        width: 100%; /* Set the width to 100% */
        display: flex; /* Use flexbox for centering */
        justify-content: center; /* Center horizontally */
        align-items: center; /* Center vertically */
    }
    .page-header-background {
        width: 100%; /* Set the background image width to 100% */
    }
    .page-header-foreground {
        position: absolute; /* Position the image absolutely */
        top: 50%; /* Position from the top */
        left: 50%; /* Position from the left */
        transform: translate(-50%, -50%); /* Center the image using transforms */
        z-index: 1; /* Set a higher z-index to make sure it appears on top */
        max-width: 27%; /* Set maximum width to 80% of the container */
        max-height: 27%; /* Set maximum height to 80% of the container */
        width: auto; /* Allow the image to scale proportionally */
        height: auto; /* Allow the image to scale proportionally */
    }
	.page-header-foreground-wellness {
        position: absolute; /* Position the image absolutely */
        top: 50%; /* Position from the top */
        left: 50%; /* Position from the left */
        transform: translate(-50%, -50%); /* Center the image using transforms */
        z-index: 1; /* Set a higher z-index to make sure it appears on top */
        max-width: 80%; /* Set maximum width to 80% of the container */
        max-height: 80%; /* Set maximum height to 80% of the container */
        width: auto; /* Allow the image to scale proportionally */
        height: auto; /* Allow the image to scale proportionally */
}
.page-header-foreground-lockedon {
        position: absolute; /* Position the image absolutely */
        top: 50%; /* Position from the top */

        z-index: 1; /* Set a higher z-index to make sure it appears on top */
        max-width: 50%; /* Set maximum width to 80% of the container */

        width: auto; /* Allow the image to scale proportionally */
        height: auto; /* Allow the image to scale proportionally */
}
</style>

<style>.card-list {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr);
            gap: 20px;
            max-width: 1200px;
            margin: 0 auto;
        }

        .card {
            position: relative;
            width: 100%;
            padding-top:  calc(100% / 1.78); 
            border-radius: 10px;
            overflow: hidden;
            background-color: #fff;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: transform 0.3s ease, box-shadow 0.3s ease;
        }

        .card:hover {
            transform: scale(1.05);
            box-shadow: 0 8px 16px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
        }

        .card-image {
            position: absolute;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            background-size: cover;
            background-repeat: no-repeat;
            background-position: center;
        }
        
        .card-link {
            display: block;
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            text-decoration: none;
        }
@media (max-width: 768px) {
    .card-list {
        grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    }

    .card-column {
        flex-direction: column;
    }
}

/*Promo Module Padding Fix*/
.Page-twoColumn .Page-main [data-module], [data-modulewell] [data-modulewell] [data-module] {
    margin-bottom: 15px !important;
}
.PageListStandardL .PageList-items-item:first-of-type {
    border-bottom: 0px solid var(--color-list-border)
}</style>
<style>.LO-card-list {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(5, 1fr); /* 5 columns */
            gap: 20px;
            max-width: 1200px; /* Adjusted for more cards */
            margin: 0 auto;
        }

        .LO-card {
            position: relative;
            width: 100%;
            padding-top: 100%; /* Aspect ratio: 1 (square) */
            border-radius: 0px;
            overflow: hidden;
            background-color: #fff;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: transform 0.3s ease, box-shadow 0.3s ease;
        }

        .LO-card:hover {
            transform: scale(1.05);
            box-shadow: 0 8px 16px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
        }

        .LO-card-image {
            position: absolute;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            background-size: cover;
            background-repeat: no-repeat;
            background-position: center;
        }
        
        .LO-card-link {
            display: block;
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            text-decoration: none;
        }
@media (max-width: 768px) {
    .LO-card-list {
        grid-template-columns: repeat(3,1fr); /* 3 columns */
    }

    .LO-card-column {
        flex-direction: column;
    }
}</style>

    <!DOCTYPE html>

<title>Support Us Button Widget</title>
<style>
/* Style for the floating button container */
.floating-button-container {
  position: fixed;
  bottom: 100px;
  left: 20px;
  z-index: 9999; /* Set a high z-index to ensure the button appears in front of everything */  
}

/* Style for the main floating button */
.floating-button {
  background-color: #52bc26;
  color: #fff;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 30px; /* Adjusted border-radius to make it pill-shaped */
  padding: 10px 20px; /* Added padding to create space around the text */
  font-size: 18px;
  text-align: center;
  box-shadow: 0px 2px 5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
  cursor: pointer;
  font-family: 'Poppins', sans-serif; /* Use Poppins font */
  font-weight: bold; /* Set font weight to bold */
  animation: bounce 0.5s ease infinite alternate; /* Bounce animation */
  transition: transform 0.2s; /* Smooth transition for the grow hover effect */
}

/* Style for the main button's hover effect */
.floating-button:hover {
  background-color: #3b7221;
}


/* Grow hover animation */
.floating-button:hover {
  transform: scale(1.1); /* Grow the button by 10% */
}

/* Bounce animation */
@keyframes bounce {
  from {
    transform: translateY(0);
  }
  to {
    transform: translateY(-5px);
  }
}

/* Style for the sub-buttons container */
.sub-buttons {
  position: absolute;
  bottom: -100px; /* Adjusted bottom position to move the sub-buttons below the main button */
  left: 0; /* Align sub-buttons container to the left side */
  width: auto; /* Adjusted width to fit content */
  text-align: left; /* Align sub-buttons text to the left */
  opacity: 0;
  transition: opacity 0.3s ease, bottom 0.3s ease; /* Added bottom transition */
}

/* Style for the sub-buttons */
.sub-button {
  background-color: #52bc26;
  color: #fff;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 30px; /* Adjusted border-radius to make it pill-shaped */
  padding: 10px 20px; /* Added padding to create space around the text */
  font-size: 18px;
  font-family: 'Poppins', sans-serif; /* Use Poppins font */
  font-weight: bold; /* Set font weight to bold */
  margin-top: 10px;
  text-align: left; /* Align sub-buttons text to the left */
  white-space: nowrap; /* Prevent sub-buttons from wrapping */  
}

/* Style for the sub-buttons when hovered */
.sub-button:hover {
  background-color: #3b7221;
}

/* Show sub-buttons when hovering over the main button */
.floating-button-container:hover .sub-buttons {
  bottom: 60px; /* Adjusted bottom position to show the sub-buttons */
  opacity: 1;
}
</style>

<script>
function toggleSubButtons() {
  var subButtons = document.getElementById("subButtons");

  subButtons.style.bottom = (subButtons.style.bottom === "60px") ? "-100px" : "60px";
}
document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
  // Get all sub-buttons
  var subButtons = document.querySelectorAll(".sub-button");

  // Add event listener to each sub-button
  subButtons.forEach(function(button, index) {
    button.addEventListener("click", function() {
      // Define URLs for each sub-button
      var urls = [
 "https://givebutter.com/supportlocalmedia/clttoday",      "https://advertise.6amcity.com/",  
      ];

      // Redirect to the corresponding URL when clicked
      window.location.href = urls[index];
    });
  });
});
</script>
